summary: This document is an email chain regarding a wire transfer request for Ghislaine Maxwell. It shows a $50,000 transfer from her savings to an external account at Citi bank, initiated at her request.

persons.name: Julian Shkreli
persons.context: Sends an email confirming the completion of a wire transfer as discussed with Chelsey Waldron.

persons.name: Chelsey Devon Waldron
persons.context: Was discussed with regarding the wire transfer and is copied on the email chain about the transfer request.

persons.name: Vijai Ramdeen
persons.context: Copied on the email chain regarding the wire transfer request for Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Noelle Maxwell
persons.context: The individual who requested a $50,000 external transfer from her savings account to an external Citi bank account.

connections.description: Shkreli is handling a financial wire transfer request made by Maxwell.
Waldron was involved in discussions about the wire transfer requested by Maxwell.
Colleagues corresponding about completing a financial transaction.

events.title: Wire Transfer Request by Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell requested an external wire transfer of $50,000 from her savings to an external Citi bank account.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell initiated a $50,000 wire transfer from her savings to an external Citi bank account.
The transfer request was handled by staff including Julian Shkreli, Chelsey Devon Waldron, and Vijai Ramdeen.
The document is dated August 21, 2014, showing financial activity by Maxwell during this period.
The email chain is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the Epstein case document set.
